text: Marty Balin (; born Martyn Jerel Buchwald; January 30, 1942 â€“ September 27, 2018) was an American singer-songwriter, and musician. He was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. Balin was best known as the founder and one of the lead singers and songwriters of Jefferson Airplane and Jefferson Starship. Balin died on September 27, 2018 in Tampa, Florida at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:Singers from Cincinnati Category:Writers from Cincinnati Category:Musicians from Cincinnati
title: Marty Balin
